Description:
Parkside presence and light filled perspective

Unrivalled luxury living in exclusive precinct.
A leafy streetscape within the exclusive Tintern precinct combined with magnificent views of the Dandenongs form a tranquil foundation for this luxurious sanctuary, dedicated to exemplary grand-scale family living and entertaining, all set on a huge, meticulously landscaped parcel of land amassing an impressive 1580m2 (approx.).

Every care has been taken to achieve a residence that is not only inviting, but inspiring at every turn, displaying a series of sophisticated spaces underpinned by lavish proportions and exquisite appointments.
Upon entry, a fresh white-on-white palette offers an intriguing departure from the contrasting deep-toned exterior, a stunning effect also echoed in the beautiful staircase which is perfectly offset by the natural tones produced by the engineered oak timber flooring.
There is a great sense of connectivity throughout the house with the highly functional floorplan placing the formal lounge on the immediate left as you enter, in addition to the lavish wall-to-wall spaciousness experienced as you step down into the open-plan family and dining areas where you'll discover the full effect of the lofty twelve-foot ceiling and glossy bespoke cabinetry that takes centre stage in this awe-inspiring living zone.
Sleek and highly functional, the spacious state-of-the-art kitchen places an emphasis on aesthetics, as well as providing a consummate cooking experience. Everyday living convenience comes with complements of the latest quality appointments, such as; Smeg dual fuel cooker, integrated dishwasher, soft-close drawers, exceptional storage, marble benchtops, as well as glamourous backsplash and pendant lighting adding a stunning finish. The Butler's pantry is revealed through easy open doors, accessing a secret and spacious corridor of working bench space, sink, shelving and drawers. The attention to detail will impress even the most discerning buyer.
Extending the living space, sliding doors open up for a seamless merging of indoor/outdoor living where the enviable alfresco features a built-in wood heater, outdoor heating lamps and ample space to relax and entertain with friends and family. The glass fence and extensive lighting enhance the salt-chlorinated swimming pool and spa (solar heated) area where the encirclement of a magnificent decking creates surplus space for poolside lounging.
Four sizable bedrooms are zoned away from the living areas for ultimate privacy and comprise double built-in robes. The amenities continue to astound with an adjoining powder room (one of two), in addition to a high-performance laundry enhanced with expansive cupboard space and laundry chute.
The master retreat is located upstairs, fitted with a superb walk-in robe and decadent full ensuite complete with a walk-in rain shower, twin vanity, in addition to the same exquisite décor and high-end quality stamped throughout. The adjoining living area forms part of the parents' retreat and opens up to a private balcony boasting a kitchenette and magnificent views to be enjoyed with a glass of red.
This first-class residence will immerse the occupants in a host of unrivalled inclusions, with highlights listing as; gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, ducted vacuum, LED lights, ceiling fans, full landscaping, C-Bus automatic lighting, automatic gates, under-house storage/workshop, timer sprinkler system, remote double garage with cupboards, attic with gentle incline ladder and a studio at the rear featuring split system air-conditioning, kitchen and bathroom, in addition to a tandem carport and extra parking behind the garage.
Prominently situated in a well-established area and in walking distance to; Pinjarra Kindergarten, Tintern Grammar, Tinternvale Primary School, bus stop, Cheong Park with barbeque area and playground, also zoned for Ringwood Secondary College and just moments from Burnt Bridge Shopping Centre, railway stations, Aquinas College, and EastLink freeway for direct access to surrounding suburbs.
This beautiful bespoke residence is a builder's own home and is proudly open for admiration.
